item.title: 世界经济有望摆脱滞胀困境，前景一片光明
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）表示，随着经济增长被证明更具韧性，世界经济前景正在复苏，许多国家的通胀降温速度将快于此前的预期。【原文：The world’s economic outlook is perking up as growth proves more resilient and inflation is set to cool faster than previously expected in many countries, the OECD said.】

item.title: 经合组织认为英国明年在七国集团增长排名中垫底
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）的最新预测显示，由于隐形税收和高利率挤压经济，英国明年的经济增长速度将比其他主要发达经济体更慢。【原文：Britain will grow more slowly next year than any other major advanced economy as stealth taxes and high interest rates squeeze the economy, the latest forecasts from the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development show.】

item.title: 创纪录的现金需求引发英国央行将停止出售债券的猜测
item.description: 据分析师称，银行对英格兰银行现金的创纪录需求可能导致决策者在几个月内通过债券市场放宽金融条件。【原文：Banks’ record demand for cash from the Bank of England may lead policy makers to ease financial conditions through the bond market within months, according to analysts.】

item.title: 瑞典破产案件连续 21 个月激增 无缓解迹象
item.description: 瑞典信贷安全局（Creditsafe）的数据显示，瑞典 4 月份的破产案件年增长率已连续 21 个月上升。【原文：Bankruptcies in Sweden extended their streak of annual increases to 21 months in April, according to data from Creditsafe, which expects no immediate relief even as inflation slows and rate cuts are approaching.】

item.title: 欧洲央行下令削减俄罗斯业务后，德国莱弗森银行撤回业绩指引
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）下令加快削减俄罗斯业务后，Raiffeisen Bank International AG 暂停了全年目标，但维持了对核心国家的指导。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG suspended its full-year targets while maintaining the guidance for its core countries, after the European Central Bank ordered a faster reduction of its Russian operations.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率超预期跃升至四个月高点
item.description: 瑞士通胀率跃升至四个月来的新高，超出了经济学家的预期，这使瑞士官员有理由在决定是否再次降息时保持谨慎。【原文：Swiss inflation jumped more than economists anticipated to a four-month high, giving officials grounds for caution as they determine whether to cut interest rates again.】

item.title: 日本央行周四数据或将揭示日本是否再次干预以刺激日元走势
item.description: 交易员们可以从日本央行的数据中寻找线索，以了解日本央行本周是否第二次介入货币市场以阻止日元下滑。【原文：Traders can look to data from the Bank of Japan for clues on whether authorities stepped into the currency market for a second time this week to stem the yen’s slide.】

item.title: 美国比特币 ETF 外流创纪录，贝莱德和富达基金受挫
item.description: 美国现货比特币交易所交易基金遭遇最大单日资金外流，数字代币创下自2023年8月以来最糟糕的一周。【原文：US spot-Bitcoin exchange-traded funds suffered their largest daily outflow as the digital token heads for its worst week since August 2023.】

item.title: 壳牌保持回购步伐，利润超出预期
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在第一季度利润降幅低于预期的情况下，继续加快股票回购步伐，保持了对股东回报的关注，这已成为石油巨头的标志。【原文：Shell Plc kept up the pace of share buybacks as first-quarter profit dropped less than expected, maintaining the focus on shareholder returns that has become a hallmark of the oil majors.】

item.title: 住友商事在新中期计划中提高股东回报率
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp.【原文：Japanese trading firm Sumitomo Corp. said it will buy back its stock and adopt a progressive dividend policy, bringing it in line with the other four major peers in an effort to boost shareholder returns.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
星展集团富裕客户重返交易市场有望推动 2024 年利润增长
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）首席执行官表示，其富裕客户的交易正变得越来越活跃，这将推动新加坡最大贷款机构今年的利润增长。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd.’s chief executive said its rich clients are becoming more active in trading, which will drive profits at Singapore’s largest lender this year.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔盈利增长后看好钢铁业前景
item.description: 在第一季度盈利超过预期后，中国以外的全球最大钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）对中长期需求前景保持乐观。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA, the world’s biggest steelmaker outside of China, remains positive on the medium to long-term outlook for demand after first-quarter earnings beat estimates.】

item.title: 韩国为企业提高估值奠定基础
item.description: 韩国监管机构就公司如何增加股东回报和改善公司治理发布了指导原则，朝着提升韩国 1.8 万亿美元股票市场的低迷估值又迈出了一步。【原文：South Korea’s regulators issued guidelines on how companies can increase shareholder returns and improve corporate governance, taking another step toward boosting depressed valuations in the nation’s $1.8 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 日元干预风险迫使东京交易商放弃假期
item.description: 对于日本的货币交易员来说，周五开始的长周末并不会让他们休息太久，因为在本周两次疑似干预之后，市场对官方行动保持着高度警惕。【原文：For currency traders in Japan the long weekend starting Friday won’t be much of a break as the market stays on high alert for official action after two suspected interventions this week.】

item.title: StanChart 盈利超预期，得益于交易和财富管理业务
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）公布的第一季度盈利超出预期，主要得益于交易和财富管理业务。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc reported first-quarter earnings that beat estimates, boosted by trading and its wealth businesses.】

item.title: ICICI 银行否认首席执行官巴赫希寻求下台的报道
item.description: 印度市值第二大的贷款机构 ICICI 银行否认了周四的一篇媒体报道，该报道称常务董事兼首席执行官桑迪普-巴赫希（Sandeep Bakhshi）希望卸任。【原文：ICICI Bank, India’s second-largest lender by market capitalization, has denied a media report Thursday which said Managing Director and CEO Sandeep Bakhshi wants to step down from his position.】

item.title: 不能说杰罗姆-鲍威尔是个大预言家
item.description:

item.title: 捷克将下调利率，前景更加鹰派
item.description: 捷克共和国准备将利率再下调半个百分点，但经济复苏的萌芽和通胀的胶着可能会在接下来的几个月里减缓货币宽松政策。【原文：The Czech Republic is poised to cut interest rates by another half of a percentage point, but a nascent economic recovery and sticky inflation may slow monetary easing in the following months.】

item.title: 贝利应对英国央行在何时下调英国利率问题上的分歧
item.description: 英国央行决策者似乎出现了自去年结束加息周期以来最严重的分歧，这说明行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）在未来几周内引导其同事进行可能的降息时所面临的挑战。【原文：Bank of England policymakers appear the most divided since they brought their hiking cycle to a close last year, illustrating the challenge that Governor Andrew Bailey faces in steering his colleagues toward possible interest rate cuts in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 印度最大炼油商恢复使用 Sovcomflot 船舶进行俄罗斯石油贸易
item.description: 印度石油公司本周恢复购买由 Sovcomflot PJSC 拥有的一艘油轮运送的俄罗斯原油，这为恢复俄罗斯和印度之间的石油运输铺平了道路，此前美国收紧的惩罚措施中断了石油运输。【原文：Indian Oil Corp. resumed buying Russian crude oil delivered on a tanker owned by Sovcomflot PJSC this week, paving the way for a restoration of oil flows between Russia and India, after tightened US penalties had disrupted shipments.】

item.title: 前 SocGen 交易员称因银行未能发现他的赌注而被解雇
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）驻香港的一名前交易员声称，在该银行发现风险管理系统未发现的高风险押注后，他被解雇了。【原文：A former Hong Kong-based Societe Generale SA trader claimed he was fired after the French lender unearthed risky bets that went undetected by its risk-management systems.】

item.title: 新加坡中央银行任命交通部长谢国忠为董事会成员
item.description: 新加坡金融管理局任命交通部长谢鸿达为董事会成员，任期从 6 月 1 日开始，这将拓宽他在金融业的经验。【原文：The Monetary Authority of Singapore has appointed Transport Minister Chee Hong Tat as a board member from June 1, broadening his experience in the finance industry.】

item.title: 必和必拓的巨额竞购让中国矿商看到了机遇
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）以 390 亿美元的巨资收购竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），这可能是十多年来最大的一笔矿业交易，在此之后，包括中国国有铁矿石买家在内的中国主要金属公司正在考虑下一步行动。【原文：China’s leading metals companies, including its state iron ore buyer, are considering their next moves following BHP Group’s blockbuster $39 billion approach for rival Anglo American Plc, potentially the largest mining deal in over a decade.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷面临 3600 万美元的韩国卖空罚款：朝鲜
item.description: 据报道，瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse AG）因在韩国非法卖空而面临500亿韩元（约合3600万美元）的罚款，韩国当局将于本周五公布对这一行为进行更广泛调查的最新情况。【原文：Credit Suisse AG reportedly faces 50 billion won ($36 million) in penalties over illegal short selling in South Korea, where authorities are due to give an update on their broader investigation into the practice on Friday.】

item.title: Olam 提高对澳大利亚 Namoi 公司的收购要约，就在最新的最不发达国家竞标之后几天
item.description: Olam Agri Holdings Ltd.提高了对澳大利亚Namoi Cotton Ltd.公司的收购报价，超过了竞争对手路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.）的报价，使两家顶级农产品贸易商之间的竞购战升温。【原文：Olam Agri Holdings Ltd. sweetened its offer for Australia’s Namoi Cotton Ltd., topping a proposal from rival Louis Dreyfus Co. and heating up a bidding war between two top agricultural commodities traders.】

item.title: 日元持续走软，日本企业举步维艰
item.description: 日本企业对日元疲软表示出不同寻常的不安，而日本政府似乎正在出面支撑其不断下跌的货币。【原文：Japan’s companies are expressing unusual discomfort with the weak yen, just as the country’s government appears to be stepping in to prop up its tumbling currency.】

item.title: 贝莱德、Citadel 从澳大利亚基金收获数十亿美元交易
item.description: Man Group Plc、贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Man Group Plc, BlackRock Inc. and Citadel are among big winners from the giant alternatives portfolio held by Australia’s sovereign wealth fund, which has revealed the size of its mandates for the first time.】

item.title: 吉姆-奥尼尔称美国可能加强对日元汇率走势的口头干预
item.description: 吉姆-奥尼尔（Jim O'Neill）认为，美国官员已经在密切关注日元走势，他们可能会采取更加 "具体 "和 "公开 "的言论来帮助日本稳定其货币颓势。【原文：US officials already have a watchful eye on the yen and may resort to more “specific” and “public” rhetoric to help Japan stabilize its currency rout, according to Jim O’Neill.】
